Contribution from a student at Shanghai University
On October 24, another student at Shanghai University jumped off a building
Since the start of the spring semester, jumping off buildings has become a common occurrence on campus.

Netizen contribution
Recently, primary and secondary schools in Beijing and Tianjin were forced to download the Xueyouyoujiao app. Netizens reported that they received promotional calls from people selling courses right after they registered. When they asked where they got the phone number, the other party immediately ended the promotion and hung up.

[Beijing bridge guard salary revealed: 150 for 12 hours, 220 for 24 hours]
A netizen saw an advertisement for recruiting bridge guards in a part-time job group in Beijing
Requirements: age under 45, height over 170, no criminal record.
150 yuan for 12 hours, 220 yuan for 24 hours.
The job content is to guard the bridge, and it is expected to be a 24-hour shift. If the government does not allow it in the future, it will be a 12-hour shift.
